item.title: GuangTao's Xah Fly Keys config
item.description: .ox-hugo-toc ul { list-style: none; } Table of Contents 1 use package with xah-fly-keys 2 define-key xah-fly-keys-map(Insert mode) 3 define-key xah-fly-keys-map(Command mode) 4 specific keys in different mode map 4.1 load all of specific keys 4.2 Only Linux keys 4.3 .-dot 4.4 ,-comma 4.5 /-slash 4.6 ;-semicolon 4.7 '-apostrophe 4.8 =-e 4.9 p-keymap 4.10 P-key 4.11 â€“minus 4.12 Color 5 define-key xah-fly-leader-key-map 6 search-keys (leader-key to “s”) 7 org-keys (leader-key to “o”) 8 magit-keys (leader-key to “m”) Emacs: Xah Fly Keys Customization Emacs: Xah Fly Keys Tutorial 1 use package with xah-fly-keys (use-package!
